entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries later this morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
